intro.s: So there was a time in my life when I worked as the joke proofreader on Laffy Taffy bars.[#4110#]It made me bitter for the rest of my life,[#6044#]but I still like eating Laffy Taffy, so now I’m dragging your toes into my fresh Hell.

setup.t: Why do seagulls fly over the sea?
setup.s: “Why do seagulls fly over the sea?[#2621#]

punchline.t: If they flied over the bay, they’d be bagels.
punchline.s: If they flied over the bay, they’d be bagels.”

post_punchline.s: Okay, that one’s a bit clever. Speaking of bagels,

question.t: If you smoked weed that made you feel like a bagel, what would you say?
question.s: If you smoked weed that made you feel like a bagel, what would you say?

t: “Dude, I’m so [b]baked and fried[/b] right now.”
“Holy $#%&, I feel like I’m [b]baked and boiled[/b], dude!”
options.s: “Dude, I’m so baked and fried right now.”,[#2723#]“Whoa, I’m absolutely steamed and baked.”,[#5364#]“Man, I feel totally boiled and baked.”, or[#8260#]“Holy sh**, I feel like I’m baked and boiled, dude!”?

option0.s: There’s a reason why bagels are healthier than donuts. But also, less tastier.

option1.s: The only thing getting steamed here is the hams I put on the bagels.

option2.s: Bagels are made by first boiling the batter, then baking it for emphasis.

outro.s: Bagels are like the boring uncles of donuts.[#2134#]But on the bright side, you can load it up with tomato sauce and Italian sausage[#5720#]and make it just as tasty and unhealthy as a donut.
